reviewText: My handicapped nephew loves this show so when I saw it bought it asap.  Didn't catch that wouldn't work in US DVD so now my little nephew stuck with this product and no birthday present.  How can I get rid of this
Wouldn't play in any of my DVD players in the house just the portable one in the truck
My son is 2 1/2 and he loves this series.  Figaro doesn't speak, just makes noises and there are subtitles.  It's fun an funny; very eccentric.
If Tim Burton did Mr. Bean for kids....
